alert.note: Alert for Delta; Hopkins; Hunt; Rains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 3:01PM CDT until June 13 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Hunt County in north central Texas... Hopkins County in north central Texas... Northern Rains County in north central Texas... Delta County in north central Texas... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 300 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greenville Club Lake, or near Greenville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Sulphur Springs, Commerce, Cooper, East Tawakoni, Point, Cumby, Como, Campbell, Cooper Lake, Greenville City Lakes, Big Creek Lake, Greenville Club Lake, Cooper Lake State Park, Lake Sulphur Springs, Klondike, Lake Tawakoni, Lone Oak, Pine Forest and Tira. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 94 and 142. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm has a history of producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
